original_text: And said, If thou wilt diligently hearken to the voice of the Lord thy God, and wilt do that which is right in his sight, and wilt give ear to his commandments, and keep all his statutes, I will put none of these diseases upon thee, which I have brought upon the Egyptians: for I am the Lord that healeth thee.
korean_text: 이르시되 너희가 너희 하나님 나 여호와의 말을 들어 순종하고 내가 보기에 의를 행하며 내 계명에 귀를 기울이며 내 모든 규례를 지키면 내가 애굽 사람에게 내린 모든 질병 중 하나도 너희에게 내리지 아니하리니 나는 너희를 치료하는 여호와임이라

sentences.original_text: If thou wilt diligently hearken to the voice of the Lord thy God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 하나님 여호와의 목소리를 귀를 기울여 잘 듣고

sentences.original_text: and wilt do that which is right in his sight
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 보시기에 정직한 행할 것을 행하며

sentences.original_text: and wilt give ear to his commandments
I will put none of these diseases upon thee
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이 모든 질병을 네게 두지 아니하리니

sentences.original_text: which I have brought upon the Egyptians
for I am the Lord that healeth thee
